snippet.title: Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S (3DO / 1995) - Sailor Chibi Moon [Playthrough/LongPlay]
snippet.description:
You can become a member if you'd like to support my channel and get access to perks, Thanks!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxpMGDjWkZVQxhhHOCwOO2w/join

#sailormoon  #sailorchibimoon 
*Platform:* 3DO
*Developer* Tose
*Publisher:* Bandai
*Year:* 1995

Information from (wikipedia.org):
*Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S [Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S (美少女戦士セーラームーンS)]* is a fighting game developed by Tose and published by Bandai exclusively for the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer in Japan on 17 March 1995. It is based upon Naoko Takeuchi's Sailor Moon shōjo manga and anime series, though its gameplay has been compared with other titles in the same genre such as SNK's Samurai Shodown. Loosely following the third season of the anime series, which adapted the third arc of the manga, the players control either one of the five original Inner Senshi or one of the three Outer Senshi as they enter a tournament to fight against each other and become the winning victor. Takeuchi supervised the production of the project and seiyūs from the anime series returned to reprise their roles.

*The (Intro/Opening) of the game available here:*
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UdVTUbatTvU

*Playlist - Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S (3DO / 1995)*
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHMOneZpTl--LBoPcfgCbhtMa830NYOh5

Sailor Chibi Moon (Chibiusa/ちびうさ) [Playthrough/LongPlay]
00:00:00 Game Start
00:00:08 Title / Menu
00:00:39 Character Select
00:01:07 vs Sailor Pluto (Setsuna Meioh/冥王 せつな)
00:03:58 vs Sailor Mercury (Ami Mizuno/水野 亜美)
00:06:41 vs Neptune (Michiru Kaioh/海王 みちる) 
00:09:21 vs Sailor Uranus (Haruka Tenoh/天王 はるか)
00:13:58 vs Sailor Jupiter (Makoto Kino/木野 まこと)
00:16:39 vs Sailor Venus (Minako Aino/愛野 美奈子)
00:19:24 vs Sailor Moon (Usagi Tsukino/月野 うさぎ)
00:23:37 vs Sailor Mars (Rei Hino/火野 レイ) 
00:27:55 vs Super Sailor Moon (Usagi Tsukino/月野 うさぎ)
00:31:09 Ending
00:32:04 Credits
00:34:10 Thank You For Watching!
